name: agentic-web-foundation
description: AWS tools to create agentic web foundation network

scripts.foundation:up: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file foundation.yaml --stack-name foundation-staging --parameter-overrides Environment=staging KeyPairName=aws-us-west-2-local --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.foundation:up:prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file foundation.yaml --stack-name foundation-prod --parameter-overrides Environment=prod KeyPairName=aws-us-west-2-local --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.foundation:status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name foundation-staging --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.foundation:status:prod: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name foundation-prod --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
